ResearchProjectDef.label: Time of Day Switch
ResearchProjectDef.description: Research a power switch that can be configured to turn on or off depending on the time of day.
ResearchProjectDef.discoveredLetterText: You may now construct power switches that can be configured to turn on or off at specified times. \n\nNOTE: Do not connect your lamps, turrets, etc. directly to the switch! Add a power cable and connect that!
